scripts.test: cd .. && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 0
scripts.np:test: cd .. && echo "Error: no test specified" && cd src && exit 0
scripts.beforePublish: npm run copyPackageJson && npm run copyNpmignore
scripts.afterPublish: npm run removePackageJson && npm run removeNpmignore
scripts.release: npm run beforePublish && cd ./src && np && cd .. && npm run afterPublish
